meta.name: Sustainable RCMPSP – Construction Portfolio
meta.description: Bi-objective RCMPSP for a 3-project construction portfolio. Objectives: (1) minimize total delay penalties across projects; (2) minimize total water consumption during the construction phase. Includes FS+lag precedences and inter-project dependencies.
